titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Port Austin Coast Guard Station No. 249 records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Port Austin Coast Guard Station No. 249 (Port Austin, Mich.)

did.unittitle: Port Austin Coast Guard Station No. 249 records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The Port Austin, Mich., station of the U.S. Life-Saving Service was established about 1881. It was closed in the 1930s and the building is now privately owned.
archdesc.scopecontent: The collection consists of administrative correspondence received at the Port Austin Coast Guard Station from the district superintendent. The correspondence was found in the building after it was sold to a private owner in the 1930s.

corpname.primary_name: Port Austin Coast Guard Station No. 249 (Port Austin, Mich.)
